description: This file defines the NotesRepository class, providing high-level CRUD operations for Note objects using the NotesDb class as the database backend.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: Provides high-level CRUD operations for notes, encapsulating database interactions.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Retrieves all notes, optionally filtered by search term and sorted by a specified field.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Fetches a note by its unique identifier.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new note into the database and returns the note with its new ID.

methods.name: upsert
methods.description: Inserts or updates a note depending on whether it has an ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.
